rows.label: qev019402_MSG0001
rows.name: How's it going, pal? Still rakin' in those credits?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019402_MSG0002
rows.name:
...Huh? You need me for something? Well, I sure hope
it's one of those get-rich-quick schemes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019402_JNK0010
rows.name: Request

rows.label: qev019402_SEL0011
rows.name: Directly ask Tobias for the data unit.

rows.label: qev019402_JNK0020
rows.name: Probe

rows.label: qev019402_SEL0021
rows.name: Feel Tobias out to see if he actually has the data unit.

rows.label: qev019402_MSG0003
rows.name:
...D-data units? Where the hell did you hear about
those?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019402_MSG0004
rows.name:
All right, all right! You can stop with the innocent
question act alreadyâ€”I ain't a damn idiot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019402_MSG0006
rows.name:
So you think I have important data regarding
FrontierNav, huh? Where the hell did you hear
about that, anyway?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019402_MSG0007
rows.name:
Kirsty? Why, that hypocritical little...
So the old girl finally got this far, eh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019402_MSG0008
rows.name:
Well, I'm not saying I won't hand it over...
Just not for free.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019402_MSG0009
rows.name: It'll run you 100,000 credits. It's worth at LEAST that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019402_MSG0010
rows.name:
What do you say? Shouldn't be too hard for a tough
[ST:gender p1=guy p2=gal ] like you to scrape together that kind of dough.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019402_MSG0011
rows.name:
Well? You got the money to buy my data unit yet
or what?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019402_MSG0012
rows.name:
When you think about what's on it, a hundred grand
is a damn bargain.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019402_JNK0030
rows.name: Buy

rows.label: qev019402_SEL0031
rows.name: Purchase the data unit for 100,000 credits.

rows.label: qev019402_JNK0040
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: qev019402_SEL0041
rows.name: Insist that you'll never pay that much.

rows.label: qev019402_MSG0013
rows.name:
Appreciate the business. Heh heh... Aw, this is sweet!
Should be more than enough for me to get started
as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019402_MSG0014
rows.name: Get this back to Kirsty in one piece, yeah?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019402_MSG0015
rows.name:
Oh, and I went ahead and removed all that annoying
encryption for you. It's nothing but raw data now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019402_MSG0016
rows.name: This ain't the time to be stingy, pal![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019402_MSG0017
rows.name:
You're a [ST:gender p1=man  p2=woman  ]of means, yeah? I bet you've got at
least that much squirreled away someplace.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019402_MSG0018
rows.name: ...Wait, you don't have that much? Really?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019402_MSG0019
rows.name:
Well, you know the drill. Slap those research probes
down and start raking in new customers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019402_MSG0020
rows.name:
I didn't think the little minx Kirsty would gather all
them data units...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019402_MSG0021
rows.name:
Ha! Looks like things have gotten interesting back home
while I've been out making money.[ST:wait ]
